commentary: Trent Boult continues to search for breakthroughs but has thus far been expensive, with Klaasen and Reddy rotating the strike effectively to keep the scoreboard ticking at 113 for 3 in the 17th over. The Mumbai Indians bowlers will need to tighten their lengths as the batters look to capitalize on any loose deliveries.

Trent Boult is struggling to find his rhythm, having gone for 27 runs in his 3.3 overs, while Klaasen and Reddy continue to rotate the strike effectively, pushing the score to 113 for 3 as they eye a strong finish to their innings. The Mumbai Indians bowlers must tighten their lengths to avoid being punished further as we approach the final overs.

Heinrich Klaasen, still at the crease, needs to find his rhythm as the Mumbai Indians bowlers look to capitalize on this breakthrough.
